lints.description: Import statements found beyond the first cell of the notebook.
lints.recommendation: Move import statements to the first code cell to make your notebook dependencies more explicit.

lints.description: An H1 Markdown heading is missing from the initial cells of the notebook.
lints.recommendation: Clarify the notebook subject by writing an H1 Markdown heading in one of the initial cells of your notebook.

lints.description: The initial notebook cells (i.e., the first 3 cells in the notebook) contain no Markdown text.
lints.recommendation: Begin your notebook by describing what you intend to do in one or more introductory Markdown cells.

lints.description: The final notebook cells (i.e., the last 3 cells in the notebook) contain no Markdown text.
lints.recommendation: Conclude your notebook by describing what you have accomplished in one or more concluding Markdown cells.

lints.description: The notebook contains too few Markdown cells compared to code cells (the ratio is below the fixed threshold of 30.0%).
lints.recommendation: Describe the steps of your computation by adding a few more Markdown cells.

lints.description: Non-executed cells are present in the notebook.
lints.recommendation: Re-run your notebook top to bottom to ensure that all cells are executed.
